entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pine Falls

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
